info.institution: Dipartimento di Informatica, University Aldo Moro of Bari
info.summary:
Annalisa Appice works as a Assistant Professor in Dipartimento di Informatica, University Aldo Moro of Bari, and his\her h-index is 21, g-index is 33. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Association Rule; Spatial Database; Spatial Data; Sensor Network;
